statements: SELECT * FROM customer_loyalty_program
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM customer_loyalty_program
SELECT * FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > 100
SELECT customer_name, rewards_earned FROM customer_loyalty_program ORDER BY rewards_earned DESC
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT * FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE rewards_earned IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_loyalty_program WHERE points_earned BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM customer_loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY point_cost DESC;
SELECT loyalty_program.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.points >= rewards.point_cost;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM loyalty_program WHERE points < 50 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.points >= rewards.point_cost WHERE loyalty_program.points > 50;
SELECT l.customer_name, r.reward_name FROM loyalty_program l JOIN rewards r ON l.points = r.point_cost WHERE r.point_cost < 100;
SELECT customer_name, points FROM (SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY points DESC) AS sorted_points LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards_catalog ORDER BY points_required ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE points < 50;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100.50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards_catalog WHERE points_required BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY reward_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, points, rewards, transaction_date, amount, reward_name FROM loyalty_program JOIN transactions ON loyalty_program.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN rewards_catalog ON loyalty_program.points = rewards_catalog.points_required;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name AS Name, points_earned AS Points FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, points_earned FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE points_earned >= 50;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, points_required FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.loyalty_points >= rewards.points_required;
SELECT customer_name AS name, loyalty_points AS points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points_required FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required < 100;
SELECT offer_name, discount_percent FROM offers ORDER BY discount_percent ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN rewards ON purchases.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
